risks.description: Exposing API keys or secrets in the code snippets requested in OBS-001.
risks.mitigation: Ensure all sensitive credentials are redacted from the provided code snippets.

risks.description: The JSON sample in OBS-002 might not be representative of all token types if the schema varies.
risks.mitigation: Verify if the schema is uniform or provide samples for different token types if necessary.

summary: These are investigative tasks requiring code analysis and data sampling. No critical blockers exist, but attention must be paid to sanitizing secrets and ensuring the data sample is relevant.
